subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project aims at structuring a knowledge center (observatory) with data and information on the themes of public consortia and federalism in Brazil.The project aims to develop an unprecedented basis in the country on Federalism and Public Consortia. Through the search process, construction and dissemination of knowledge on the subject, the Brazilian state, whether in the federal, state or municipal level- and in civil society organizations, can make use of knowledge regarding qualified consortia, thereby promoting the improvement of legal, administrative and strategic instruments of this kind of partnership. The project represents innovation in content and its impact is crucial to improve the efficiency of public services within all federal entities.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/10/001 - Public Consortium
